sqlMap.select: select SCC_ID, SC_ID, SCC_SERVICE_CODE, SCC_INIT_PASSWORD, SCC_PASSWORD, SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME, SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME, SCC_STATUS, SCC_REMARK, SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO, SCC_CHECK_REPORT, SCC_INIT_TIME, SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME, SCC_CHECK_START_TIME, SCC_CHECK_END_TIME, SCC_CREATEUSER,CUSTOMER_CODE, SCC_CREATETIME, SCC_MODIFYUSER, SCC_MODIFYTIME, SCC_EXT1, SCC_EXT2, SCC_EXT3,0 EI_ENTERPRISE_ID,0 SC_SERVICE_NAME from B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE where SCC_ID = #sccId#

select SCC_ID, SC_ID, SCC_SERVICE_CODE, SCC_INIT_PASSWORD, SCC_PASSWORD, SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME, SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME, SCC_STATUS, SCC_REMARK, SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO, SCC_CHECK_REPORT, SCC_INIT_TIME, SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME, SCC_CHECK_START_TIME, SCC_CHECK_END_TIME, SCC_CREATEUSER,CUSTOMER_CODE, SCC_CREATETIME, SCC_MODIFYUSER, SCC_MODIFYTIME, SCC_EXT1, SCC_EXT2, SCC_EXT3,0 EI_ENTERPRISE_ID,0 SC_SERVICE_NAME from B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE
where SC_ID = #scId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, c.* from ( select bc.SCC_ID, bc.SC_ID, bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE, bc.SCC_INIT_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME, bc.SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME, bc.SCC_STATUS, bc.SCC_REMARK, bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO, bc.SCC_CHECK_REPORT, bc.SCC_INIT_TIME, bc.SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_START_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_END_TIME, bc.SCC_CREATEUSER,bc.CUSTOMER_CODE, bc.SCC_CREATETIME, bc.SCC_MODIFYUSER, bc.SCC_MODIFYTIME, bc.SCC_EXT1, bc.SCC_EXT2, bc.SCC_EXT3,bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID,bcc.SC_SERVICE_NAME from B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE bc,B_SERVICE_CONFIG bcc
where bc.SC_ID=bcc.SC_ID
bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO = #sccEmployeeNo#
bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE = #sccServiceCode#
bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID = #sccEiEnterpriseId#
(bc.SCC_STATUS='1' or bc.SCC_STATUS='2' or bc.SCC_STATUS='3')
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode#
bc.SCC_CREATEUSER=#sccCreateuser#
bc.scc_createtime>=(#beginTime# || ' 00:00:00')
bc.scc_createtime<=(#endTime# || ' 23:59:59')
order by SCC_CREATETIME desc ) c) WHERE NUMROW >= $ibegin$ AND NUMROW < $iend$

SELECT count(1) as ID from ( select bc.SCC_ID, bc.SC_ID, bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE, bc.SCC_INIT_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME, bc.SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME, bc.SCC_STATUS, bc.SCC_REMARK, bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO, bc.SCC_CHECK_REPORT, bc.SCC_INIT_TIME, bc.SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_START_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_END_TIME, bc.SCC_CREATEUSER,bc.CUSTOMER_CODE, bc.SCC_CREATETIME, bc.SCC_MODIFYUSER, bc.SCC_MODIFYTIME, bc.SCC_EXT1, bc.SCC_EXT2, bc.SCC_EXT3,bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID,bcc.SC_SERVICE_NAME from B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE bc,B_SERVICE_CONFIG bcc
where bc.SC_ID=bcc.SC_ID
bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO = #sccEmployeeNo#
bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE = #sccServiceCode#
bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID = #sccEiEnterpriseId#
(bc.SCC_STATUS='1' or bc.SCC_STATUS='2' or bc.SCC_STATUS='3')
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode#
bc.SCC_CREATEUSER=#sccCreateuser#
bc.scc_createtime>=(#beginTime# || ' 00:00:00')
bc.scc_createtime<=(#endTime# || ' 23:59:59')
)
sqlMap.insert: insert into B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE (SCC_ID, SC_ID, SCC_SERVICE_CODE, SCC_INIT_PASSWORD, SCC_PASSWORD, SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME, SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME, SCC_STATUS, SCC_REMARK, SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO, SCC_CHECK_REPORT, SCC_INIT_TIME, SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME, SCC_CHECK_START_TIME, SCC_CHECK_END_TIME, SCC_CREATEUSER,CUSTOMER_CODE, SCC_CREATETIME, SCC_MODIFYUSER, SCC_MODIFYTIME, SCC_EXT1, SCC_EXT2, SCC_EXT3) values (#sccId#, #scId#, #sccServiceCode#, #sccInitPassword#, #sccPassword#, #sccServiceStarttime#, #sccServiceEndtime#, #sccStatus#, #sccRemark#, #sccEmployeeNo#, #sccCheckReport#, #sccInitTime#, #sccAcceptOrderTime#, #sccCheckStartTime#, #sccCheckEndTime#, #sccCreateuser#, #customerCode#,#sccCreatetime#, #sccModifyuser#, #sccModifytime#, #sccExt1#, #sccExt2#, #sccExt3#)
sqlMap.update: update B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE set SC_ID = #scId#, SCC_SERVICE_CODE = #sccServiceCode#, SCC_INIT_PASSWORD = #sccInitPassword#, SCC_PASSWORD = #sccPassword#, SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME = #sccServiceStarttime#, SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME = #sccServiceEndtime#, SCC_STATUS = #sccStatus#, SCC_REMARK = #sccRemark#, SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO = #sccEmployeeNo#, SCC_CHECK_REPORT = #sccCheckReport#, SCC_INIT_TIME = #sccInitTime#, SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME = #sccAcceptOrderTime#, SCC_CHECK_START_TIME = #sccCheckStartTime#, SCC_CHECK_END_TIME = #sccCheckEndTime#, SCC_CREATEUSER = #sccCreateuser#, CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode#, SCC_CREATETIME = #sccCreatetime#, SCC_MODIFYUSER = #sccModifyuser#, SCC_MODIFYTIME = #sccModifytime#, SCC_EXT1 = #sccExt1#, SCC_EXT2 = #sccExt2#, SCC_EXT3 = #sccExt3# where SCC_ID = #sccId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, c.* from ( select bc.SCC_ID, bc.SC_ID, bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE, bc.SCC_INIT_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME, bc.SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME, bc.SCC_STATUS, bc.SCC_REMARK, bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO, bc.SCC_CHECK_REPORT, bc.SCC_INIT_TIME, bc.SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_START_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_END_TIME, bc.SCC_CREATEUSER,bc.CUSTOMER_CODE, bc.SCC_CREATETIME, bc.SCC_MODIFYUSER, bc.SCC_MODIFYTIME, bc.SCC_EXT1, bc.SCC_EXT2, bc.SCC_EXT3,bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID,bcc.SC_SERVICE_NAME from B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE bc,B_SERVICE_CONFIG bcc
where bc.SC_ID=bcc.SC_ID
bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO = #sccEmployeeNo#
bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE = #sccServiceCode#
bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID = #sccEiEnterpriseId#
(bc.SCC_STATUS='1' or bc.SCC_STATUS='2' or bc.SCC_STATUS='3')
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode#
bc.SCC_CREATEUSER=#sccCreateuser#
bc.scc_createtime>=(#beginTime# || ' 00:00:00')
bc.scc_createtime<=(#endTime# || ' 23:59:59')
order by SCC_CREATETIME desc ) c) WHERE NUMROW >= $ibegin$ AND NUMROW < $iend$

select bc.SCC_ID, bc.SC_ID, bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE, bc.SCC_INIT_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_PASSWORD, bc.SCC_SERVICE_STARTTIME, bc.SCC_SERVICE_ENDTIME, bc.SCC_STATUS, bc.SCC_REMARK, bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO, bc.SCC_CHECK_REPORT, bc.SCC_INIT_TIME, bc.SCC_ACCEPT_ORDER_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_START_TIME, bc.SCC_CHECK_END_TIME, bc.SCC_CREATEUSER,bc.CUSTOMER_CODE, bc.SCC_CREATETIME, bc.SCC_MODIFYUSER, bc.SCC_MODIFYTIME, bc.SCC_EXT1, bc.SCC_EXT2, bc.SCC_EXT3,bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID,bcc.SC_SERVICE_NAME from B_SERVICE_CONFIG_CODE bc,B_SERVICE_CONFIG bcc
where bc.SC_ID=bcc.SC_ID
bc.SCC_EMPLOYEE_NO = #sccEmployeeNo#
bc.SCC_SERVICE_CODE = #sccServiceCode#
bcc.EI_ENTERPRISE_ID = #sccEiEnterpriseId#
(bc.SCC_STATUS='1' or bc.SCC_STATUS='2' or bc.SCC_STATUS='3')
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.SCC_STATUS=#sccStatus#
bc.CUSTOMER_CODE=#customerCode#
bc.SCC_CREATEUSER=#sccCreateuser#
bc.scc_createtime>=(#beginTime# || ' 00:00:00')
bc.scc_createtime<=(#endTime# || ' 23:59:59')
order by SCC_CREATETIME desc
